name: Daughter of Forkos (Vin)
description:
Medusa is tired of the countless heroes that invade her swamp and try to slay her everyday. Her gaze turns men into stone, and the market for lifelike statues is big in ancient Greece. Why not rid yourself of a nuisance and get rich at the same time?

Control Medusa with the arrow keys, space to hiss and draw the heroes' attention.

Make eye contact to petrify enemies. The more expressive the statue, the more it is worth. Heroic poses made while getting ready to attack are especially valuable.

Select statues to sell with space, confirm with enter.

Make sure not to wall yourself in with your merchandise, or you will starve!

Made for Palace Game Jam 2017.
